<h2>Replace NA in Community Data with Zeros</h2>

<h3>Description</h3>

<p>Replaces NA values in community data with zeros.
</p>


<h3>Usage</h3>

<pre><code class='language-R'>replace_na_community_data_with_zeros(data = NULL)
</code></pre>


<h3>Arguments</h3>

<table>
<tr><td><code id="data">data</code></td>
<td>
<p>A data frame. Must contain 'dataset_name' and 'sample_name' columns, and
at least one taxon column.</p>
</td></tr>
</table>


<h3>Details</h3>

<p>Converts the data to long format, replaces NA values in 'pollen_count'
with zeros, and reshapes it back to wide format.
</p>


<h3>Value</h3>

<p>A data frame with NA values replaced by zeros.
</p>
